'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This little office has been carved out of the rock of the mountain and accommodates the local gang lord: [Dereo the Lean](/dereoTheLean/).

## Points of interest

* Dereo's lair can be accessed by going right, right, left after entering [The Narrows](/theNarrows/). At the doorway, a pair of thugs stand in your way. You may enter freely if:
** ''"Dereo sent a messenger for me."'' - Dereo has previously sent for your assistance during [The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/) OR you were contacted by the [Cloaked Messenger](/cloakedMessenger/) in [The Gullet](/theGullet/) (after helping [Pitli](/pitli/) in [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/))
** ''[Show the suolenet.]'' - You have stolen the [Marked Suole](/markedSuole/) from [Overseer Hitenga](/overseerHitenga/), an item mentioned in the quest [All Aboard](/allAboard/). Talking to Dereo with the suolenet in your stash grants you minor positive reputation with Delver's Row Criminals.
** ''"I'm [Player Name]. Ernezzo sent me."'' - You have asked [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) in [Delver's Row](/delversRow/) where to find Dereo. When speaking to Ernezzo, this option is only available if you have the [The Envoy's Badge](/theEnvoysBadge/) in your stash, given to you by [Prince Aruihi](/princeAruihi/) during [Trade Secrets](/tradeSecrets/).
** Otherwise you can attack the guards, placing you in [The Narrows](/theNarrows/) staging area. Upon defeating them, Dereo will be amused at your entertaining display of passion. He forgives your intrusive entrance, granting you minor positive reputation with Delver's Row Criminals.

## Characters

* [Dereo the Lean](/dereoTheLean/)
